name: Illusion Survival - Project Infinity
description:
Background:

You're tester of illusion project, try to using another you to protect yourself. Phantom zombies will infinite coming to you, and invade to you mind. How long to survive? How much your killed? Do you best, good luck, tester. 'u'

Features:

-Free cost

-Old School top down shooter

-Infinite ammo, grenade, landmine and enemies

-Two attack type(Regular shooting and shooting with grenade)

-Four zombie type(Standard zombie, zombie dog, armored zombie and terror zombie.)

-Several buttons have hotkeys

-Male and female character gerne

-Four weapon type

Known Issues:

-Some armored zombie can one shot kill. (Can call that headshot. `v' b)

-When a lot zombie killed by explosion, just get 1 killed point. (Setting is immortal. ^u^)

PS: If you like this, please rating it. If you feeling this interesting, please follow it. If you feeling this trashy, please delete it. 'u' v (My English not very good, if has any wrong grammar, tell me, please. 'u')
